Articles.Content: I mentioned this in a comment on another forum post and now decided to post it here... At 11:00 December 31 I taped fireworks to a Falcon 9 model rocket, the parachute caught fire and burn some of my grass before I got it out with my bucket of water I had beside me prepared. sadly I didn't take any pics

That sounds fun .-.

Aside from, like, the rocket catching on fire part...
